title: Creation, Evolution, and Head coverings? What it means to say the Bible does(n’t) teach Science.
description:
#creation #evolution #bible #science #theology #demons #angels 

This video is based on some really interesting biblical interpretation I first heard on episode 86 of the Naked Bible podcast. Dr. Michael Heiser references a paper by Troy W. Martin, on 1 Corinthians 11, and gives some very interesting insights into a difficult passage. While wearing head coverings may not actually be very important in this day and age, I think there is a very interesting application that we can derive from properly understanding the context and interpretation of this notorious passage and it’s argument “from nature”
The podcast and transcript, as well as the papers referenced, are available here: 

https://nakedbiblepodcast.com/podcast/naked-bible-86-the-head-covering-of-1-corinthians-1113-15/

Also mentioned; “The Discarded Image”, by C.S. Lewis
